page.title: 02Life at home with my family
page.content: I live with my mother and father and I have three pets, two cats and a rabbit. My mother does the washing in the automatic washing machine, and the ironing which she hates although she has a steam iron. Dad and I dig and put plants in the garden while mother cleans the car. We buy our food from the Supermarket monthly and keep it in a fridge-freezer. Every Sunday we have cooked dinner,in the week we have fast foods cooked in the microwave oven. Occasionally we go to a take-away shop for fish and chips. In the evening my father and I read. I use my computer, and my mother watches television. Every Thursday I go to a young fellowship club where girls play rounders and boys play football.
